description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国华中地区的一个省，简称“鄂”，省会为武汉市。因地处洞庭湖之北而得名。
description.en: A province in the Central China region of the People's Republic of China, abbreviated as 'E'. Its capital is Wuhan. It is named for its location north of Dongting Lake.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省北部的淡水湖。
description.en: A freshwater lake in northern Hunan Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 湖北省省会和最大城市，副省级市。
description.en: The capital and largest city of Hubei Province, a sub-provincial city.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任湖北省人民政府省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Governor of the Hubei Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国人民政治协商会议湖北省委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chairman of the Hubei Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 位于亚洲的社会主义国家，通常简称“中国”。
description.en: A socialist state in Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 先秦时期位于长江流域的诸侯国。
description.en: A vassal state during the pre-Qin period, located in the Yangtze River valley.

description.zh-cn: 西周至春秋时期的诸侯国，位于今湖北武汉周边地区。
description.en: A vassal state from the Western Zhou to the Spring and Autumn period, located around modern Wuhan, Hubei.

description.zh-cn: 湖北省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国明朝和清朝初年设立的省，后被分拆为湖北省和湖南省。
description.en: A province established during the Ming and early Qing dynasties, later split into Hubei and Hunan provinces.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国华中地区的一个省。
description.en: A province in the Central China region of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪50年代英法两国对中国发动的侵略战争。
description.en: An aggressive war launched by Britain and France against China in the 1850s.

description.zh-cn: 武汉三镇之一，历史上曾是重要的商业重镇和租界区。
description.en: One of the three towns of Wuhan, historically an important commercial town and concession area.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期由洋务派官员推动的旨在“自强”、“求富”的改良运动。
description.en: A reform movement in the late Qing dynasty promoted by the Westernization faction, aiming for 'self-strengthening' and 'wealth.'

description.zh-cn: 晚清名臣，洋务派代表人物，曾任湖广总督。
description.en: A prominent official of the late Qing dynasty, a representative of the Westernization faction, who served as the Viceroy of Huguang.

description.zh-cn: 由张之洞于晚清时期创办的中国近代第一家官办钢铁企业。
description.en: China's first modern government-run iron and steel enterprise, founded by Zhang Zhidong in the late Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由张之洞于晚清时期创办的中国近代重要的军事工业企业。
description.en: An important modern military-industrial enterprise in China, founded by Zhang Zhidong in the late Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝时期管辖湖北、湖南两省的最高军政长官。
description.en: The highest military and civil official overseeing Hubei and Hunan provinces during the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 推翻中国清朝统治、建立亚洲第一个共和国中华民国的革命。
description.en: A revolution that overthrew China's Qing dynasty and established the Republic of China, the first republic in Asia.

description.zh-cn: 1911年在中国武昌发生的一场旨在推翻清朝统治的兵变，是辛亥革命的开端。
description.en: A military coup that occurred in Wuchang, China in 1911, aimed at overthrowing the Qing dynasty, marking the beginning of the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个封建王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命后建立的亚洲第一个共和国。
description.en: The first republic in Asia, established after the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争初期规模最庞大的战役之一。
description.en: One of the largest battles in the early stages of the Second Sino-Japanese War.

en: Central South Bureau of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在中华人民共和国成立初期设立的，管辖中南地区六省区的派出机构。
description.en: An agency established by the Communist Party of China in the early days of the People's Republic of China to govern the six provinces and regions of the Central South.

description.zh-cn: 由严重急性呼吸系统综合征冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）导致的全球大流行病。
description.en: A global pandemic caused by Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

description.zh-cn: 为应对2019冠状病毒病疫情，中国湖北省各地采取的一系列封锁措施。
description.en: A series of lockdown measures taken across Hubei Province, China, in response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

nodes.id: 中国宝武钢铁集团有限公司

zh-cn: 中国宝武钢铁集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国的一家特大型钢铁联合企业。
description.en: A super-large iron and steel conglomerate in China.

description.zh-cn: 位于武汉市的钢铁企业，现为中国宝武钢铁集团的子公司。
description.en: An iron and steel enterprise located in Wuhan, now a subsidiary of China Baowu Steel Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国三大汽车制造厂之一，总部位于武汉。
description.en: One of China's top three automobile manufacturers, headquartered in Wuhan.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省宜昌市的长江干流上的水利枢纽。
description.en: A major water conservancy project on the main stream of the Yangtze River in Yichang, Hubei Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省宜昌市的长江干流上的水利枢纽，是世界上规模最大的水力发电站。
description.en: A hydroelectric gravity dam on the Yangtze River in Yichang, Hubei province, China. It is the world's largest power station in terms of installed capacity.

description.zh-cn: 湖北省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党湖北省委员会书记、湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as Secretary of the Hubei Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China and Director of the Standing Committee of the Hubei Provincial People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党湖北省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党湖北省委员会
en: Hubei Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖北省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Hubei Province.

nodes.id: 湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Hubei Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 湖北省人民代表大会的常设机关，是湖北省的地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Hubei Provincial People's Congress, serving as the local organ of state power in Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative body of Hubei Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议湖北省委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议湖北省委员会
en: Hubei Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在湖北省的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 湖北省因地处洞庭湖之北而得名。
description.en: Hubei Province is named for its location north of Dongting Lake.

description.zh-cn: 湖北省是中华人民共和国的一个省。
description.en: Hubei is a province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 武汉市是湖北省的省会及最大城市。
description.en: Wuhan is the capital and largest city of Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期，鄂国被楚国吞并。
description.en: During the Spring and Autumn period, the State of E was annexed by the State of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 楚国的国都位于今湖北省荆州市。
description.en: The capital of the State of Chu was located in modern-day Jingzhou, Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 清康熙六年（1667年），湖广布政使司分治，设立湖北布政使司，湖北省从此定名。
description.en: In 1667 (the 6th year of the Kangxi Emperor's reign), the Huguang Provincial Administration Commission was divided, establishing the Hubei Provincial Administration Commission, from which the name Hubei Province originated.

description.zh-cn: 清康熙六年（1667年），湖广布政使司分治，设立湖南布政使司，湖南省从此定名。
description.en: In 1667 (the 6th year of the Kangxi Emperor's reign), the Huguang Provincial Administration Commission was divided, establishing the Hunan Provincial Administration Commission, from which the name Hunan Province originated.

description.zh-cn: 第二次鸦片战争后，汉口被开辟为商埠。
description.en: After the Second Opium War, Hankou was opened as a treaty port.

description.zh-cn: 张之洞在湖北兴办洋务企业，创办了汉阳铁厂。
description.en: Zhang Zhidong established Westernization enterprises in Hubei, founding the Hanyang Ironworks.

description.zh-cn: 张之洞在湖北兴办洋务企业，创办了汉阳兵工厂。
description.en: Zhang Zhidong established Westernization enterprises in Hubei, founding the Hanyang Arsenal.

description.zh-cn: 张之洞曾任湖广总督，期间在湖北兴办大量洋务企业。
description.en: Zhang Zhidong served as the Viceroy of Huguang, during which time he established numerous Westernization enterprises in Hubei.

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义打响了辛亥革命的第一枪。
description.en: The Wuchang Uprising fired the first shot of the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义促成了清朝的灭亡。
description.en: The Wuchang Uprising led to the downfall of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义促成了中华民国的建立。
description.en: The Wuchang Uprising led to the establishment of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，湖北省由设置在武汉的中共中央中南局管辖。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Hubei Province was governed by the Central South Bureau of the CPC, which was based in Wuhan.

description.zh-cn: 由于2019冠状病毒病疫情扩散，湖北省各地自2020年1月起相继实施封城措施。
description.en: Due to the spread of the COVID-19 pandemic, various places in Hubei Province implemented lockdown measures starting in January 2020.

relationships.target: 中国宝武钢铁集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 武汉钢铁（集团）公司是中国宝武钢铁集团有限公司的子公司。
description.en: Wuhan Iron and Steel (Group) Corp. is a subsidiary of China Baowu Steel Group Corporation Limited.

description.zh-cn: 东风汽车公司总部位于武汉。
description.en: Dongfeng Motor Corporation is headquartered in Wuhan.

relationships.target: 中国共产党湖北省委员会

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党湖北省委员会书记。
description.en: Currently serves as the Secretary of the Hubei Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 现任湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Currently serves as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Hubei Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 现任湖北省人民政府省长。
description.en: Currently serves as the Governor of the Hubei Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议湖北省委员会

description.zh-cn: 现任中国人民政治协商会议湖北省委员会主席。
description.en: Currently serves as the Chairman of the Hubei Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.
